text:
United Kingdom, Ireland 
and other countries. Millions 
of pregnant women have 
received	the	flu	vaccine	and	
the safety of the vaccine has 
been carefully monitored. This 
has shown that it is extremely 
safe to give in pregnancy, both 
for the mother and the unborn 
baby.

Your health in pregnancy
47
The	flu	vaccine	becomes	
available every year from late 
September onwards, at the 
start	of	the	winter	flu	season.	
If	you	are	pregnant	during	flu	
season	you	will	be	offered	
the	flu	vaccine	by
